post:
Black Friday is here, with this occasion, SCO HOSTING LTD will offer 32% Recurring DISCOUNT for all VPS plans.
Use this promotional code at checkout BLKFRDWHT (Offer valid until 15.11.2020)

We have 2 location:
France: https://lg-eu.scohostings.com/
New York Metro: https://lg-nyc.scohostings.com/

Go to our website to check all the VPS plans https://scohostings.com

Servers config:

EU Server:
Intel Xeon-E 2136 (3.30 - 4.50 GHz)
64GB DDR4 ECC 2666MHz
SSD NVMe Datacenter-Class RAID 1
Connection: 1 Gbps out / 10 Gbps in

US Server:
Intel Xeon E5 1650 V3 (3.50 - 3.80 GHz)
128 GB DDR4 2400MHz
SSD Hardware RAID10
Connection: 1Gbps

All plans include:

Instant Setup
14 Days Money Back Guarantee
KVM Virtualization
Virtualizor control panel.
DDoS protection.
Full root access.
99.9% Uptime.
IPv6 available.
Multiple Operating Systems.
RDNS on request. Open Ticket

Payment Methods:

All Major Credit Cards
Paypal (Just verified accounts)
Crypto (BTC, BCH, ETH) --> Bitpay, Coingate (Bitcoin and Over 50+ Altcoins)
GoCardless
Stripe

Don’t forget to use code BLKFRDWHT at checkout.

Best Regards,
Marian
